scripts.electron-dev: concurrently "cross-env BROWSER=none yarn start" "wait-on http://localhost:8081 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron main.js"
scripts.electron-win-dev: concurrently "cross-env BROWSER=none yarn start" "wait-on http://localhost:8081 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron app/main.js"
scripts.electron-win-start: yarn build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron app/main.js
scripts.electron-linux-dev: concurrently "cross-env BROWSER=none yarn start" "wait-on http://localhost:8081 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron app/main.js --no-sandbox"
scripts.electron-linux-start: yarn build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron app/main.js --no-sandbox
